docs.lead_paragraph: AGES ago, it seems, there was a small boy known as Little Willie, who had certain definite characteristics celebrated in story, verse and epithet. Willie was a necessary evil; he was seen and not--at least not often-heard. If Willie did not choose to do his homework he wore a dunce cap ...

headline.main: AS WE BRING UP WILLIE, THE 1929 MODEL; No Longer an Imp of Satan, to Be Seen and Not Heard, He Gets as Many Tests as a New Germ
